attributes.title: Took my virginity
attributes.review: Do not download this app, as soon as I downloaded it, the Trump administration broke into my house, stole my eggs and broke my hymen, they took apart of me I will never get back, the app also stated the N word several times which is not good and forced me to reveal location data which is how they found me.

attributes.title: Horrible🤡🤢
attributes.review: Take my word for it this app is not worth taking up ur storage. I opened the app and saw a Cheeto puff with a wig and was grossed out don’t waste ur precious time on this junk 💩oh and that Cheeto puff is a disgusting racist and a bunch of other things that I don’t feel like typing but there’s like 100 pages of the Cheeto puffs wrong doings.

attributes.title: DISGUSTANG😤
attributes.review: I downloaded the app with high hopes for our non-racist, non-mysoginist, non-sex offender, and non-white supremacist president. I open the app it was complete chaos. I will not download nor will I recommend to others to share. Remember: TRUMP SUPPORTERS VOTE NOVEMBER 4TH. Everyone else vote November 3rd. I will admit Trump tried to make a useful app however🤩✨but he should not try again💖🧚🏻‍♀️😹

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I thought it would be a good idea to support my president during this year but it was one of the WORST decisions. Not only is this man deleting Tik Tok but when I downloaded his app I had the racist, sexist, and homophobic comments come back to my head. I have a strong issue with this app. Get rid of it please Apple.

attributes.title: Terrible app😖🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I thought this would be a good app to support our completely non racist president... i was wrong. I found that explicit words were everywhere in this app. not to mention as soon as i opened it my phone shut off for 2 hours and would not turn on.

attributes.title: I hate it here
attributes.review: This app crashed my phone every time I asked the administrators to make a change that would make user experience better for ALL iPhone users. Before my right to choose completely vanished, I decided to abort this app, because I know what’s best for MY iPhone.

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible 🤬😤🥱
attributes.review: It took forever to download and the when it did it cause pop up to show all over my phone and also slowing my phone down tremendously would not recommend and if I could would give it negative five stars 🤬😤🤢👎

attributes.title: kept lagging
attributes.review: It took approximately 27 hours for a complete download 😾 once the app was installed every time I opened it, it just kept closing by itself!!!! also the software developers of this app are complicit to the many wrong doings of some weird old man!! please fire everyone involved!!! thanks 😍

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app is horrible after taking several weeks to download it completely shut down my phone and now I’m not able to go on any of my social media’s not to mention Trump is a horrific awful disgusting president. Absolutely disappointed

attributes.title: DiSgUsTaNg!🤮🤢
attributes.review: I got this app not too long ago and now it’s making me sick all of a sudden. I was talking to my doctor about it and he suggest not just me but others to stay away from this so called "app" I can’t stress enough how much this has effected my life with that being me, my kids, and wife!💅🏻
